attributes.action: Knight Mr Philip Hutchinson for services for Entrepreneurship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At only 16, Philip Hutchinson of Billericay in Essex set up his own company which has done extremely well.  We are asking if he could be knighted for his efforts and services done to entrepreneurship, and at such a young age of only 16.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
